Title: Relates to revoking a person's driver's license who has been convicted of operating a vessel while under the influence of alcohol or drugs
Summary: Relates to revoking a person's driver's license who has been convicted of operating a vessel while under the influence of alcohol or drugs.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the navigation law, in relation to revoking a person's driver's license following the conviction of operating a vessel while under the influence of alcohol or drugs
